name: OXYGEN (Team SolEtude)
description:
In the wind of my lung
In methane and in love
In petroleum plumes
There's a floating slice of moon
In your tooth and your claw
And your unforgiving jaws
Are you there?
Swans - A Piece Of The Sky

Inspired by Swans and Gezan's music,
OXYGEN is a demo for a short visual novel about obsessive dreams.
Discover where that obsession could lead
by experiencing days in the life of a nameless girl.

DISCLAIMER:
Some of the themes and elements in this game
could be disturbing for some audiences.

Follow us on Twitter at @TSoletude
to know more about the project and its development!

Team:
Writing, Programming: Rinkaku
Art: Elisa Bacchin
Text editing: Lidia Santoemma
